alert_delete_item_message: Are you sure you want delete this item? It will be also remove from your favorties.
alert_delete_list_message: Are you sure you want to clear this list? All your items will be delete. Your favorites will be deleted too.
about_text_1: This product is completely free. No ads, no tracking and really your privacy. If you want to encourage me to continue, you can rate this app with 5 stars on the PlayStore. You can also donate a tip for the effort because I do this app on my free time.
